Title: How to use the /share command in GitHub Copilot CLI | Demo
Description:
Did you know you can share your GitHub Copilot CLI sessions with your team? In this demo, @shanselman explores the /share command, which exports your conversation logs and diagrams directly to a gist. We also cover model selection (Claude Opus, Sonnet, etc.) and how to visualize Next.js routing structures in the terminal.

#GitHubCopilot #CopilotCLI #GitHub
